biocontainers.name: coils
biocontainers.summary: A generalized profile syntax for biomolecular sequence motifs and its function in automatic sequence interpretation.

biotools.summary: Program that compares a sequence to a database of known parallel two-stranded coiled-coils and derives a similarity score. By comparing this score to the distribution of scores in globular and coiled-coil proteins, the program then calculates the probability that the sequence will adopt a coiled-coil conformation.

bioschemas.name: COILS
bioschemas.summary: Program that compares a sequence to a database of known parallel two-stranded coiled-coils and derives a similarity score. By comparing this score to the distribution of scores in globular and coiled-coil proteins, the program then calculates the probability that the sequence will adopt a coiled-coil conformation.
